home.title: Hello! Nice to see you here!
home.descriptionProfile: "Truth can only be found in one place: the code.â€œ
home.aboutMe: My name is Victor Nunes and my professional career began through music, where I dedicated myself for more than 10 years, playing in different places and meeting different people! In parallel to my career as a musician, I graduated in Business Administration, I had several types of jobs and today I dedicate 100% of my time to the art of programming!
home.aboutMe2: It's been over a year since I've been delving into software development for both front-end and back-end technologies. I like to read about Clean Code, Software Architecture, Design Patterns, TDD and other concepts/techniques that make me a better programmer every day!
